nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.stats

Interface StatisticalActivityService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service, StatisticalService
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StatisticalActivityServiceLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticalActivityServiceImpl, StatisticalActivityServiceSecurity

    public interface StatisticalActivityService
extends StatisticalService
    Service interface for Activity Statistics.

    rinke

    • Method Detail

      • getComparePeriodsGrossProduct

        StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsGrossProduct(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets a data value object for the comparison of the gross product per member for two periods. It should get the values for the two periods, the relative growth percentage between them, and the p-value (indicating if the difference was statistically significant). A value for a period consists of the median amount, plus a number indication the 95%-confidence interval.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form parameters
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data

      • getComparePeriodsLoginTimes

        StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsLoginTimes(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the frequency of logging in of members (per week), comparing the two periods. It should get the values for the two periods, the relative growth percentage between them, and the p-value (indicating if the difference was statistically significant). A value for a period consists of the median amount, plus a number indication the 95%-confidence interval.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form params
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data

      • getComparePeriodsNumberTransactions

        StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsNumberTransactions(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the data for comparison of the number of transactions for two periods. It should get the values for the two periods, the relative growth percentage between them, and the p-value (indicating if the difference was statistically significant). A value for a period consists of the median amount, plus a number indication the 95%-confidence interval.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form params
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data

      • getComparePeriodsPercentageNoTrade

        StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsPercentageNoTrade(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the data on the percentage of members which is not trading, for comparing these. over two periods. It should get the values for the two periods, the relative growth percentage between them, and the p-value (indicating if the difference was statistically significant). A value for a period consists of the median amount, plus a number indication the 95%-confidence interval.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form params
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data

      • getHistogramGrossProduct

        StatisticalResultDTO getHistogramGrossProduct(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the data for creating a histogram of the distribution of gross product over the members. This data should split up a set of numbers (for each member the personal gross product), and split this set up into reasonable categories, indicating the number of members found in each categorie. This splitting up is done by the class HistogramDTOFactory.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form params
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data
        See Also:
        HistogramDTOFactory

      • getHistogramLoginTimes

        StatisticalResultDTO getHistogramLoginTimes(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the data for creating a histogram of the distribution of login frequency over the members. This data should split up a set of numbers (for each member the personal login frequency per week), and split this set up into reasonable categories, indicating the number of members found in each categorie. This splitting up is done by the class HistogramDTOFactory.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form params
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data
        See Also:
        HistogramDTOFactory

      • getHistogramNumberTransactions

        StatisticalResultDTO getHistogramNumberTransactions(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the data for creating a histogram of the distribution of the number of transactions over the members. This data should split up a set of numbers (for each member the personal number of transactions), and split this set up into reasonable categories, indicating the number of members found in each categorie. This splitting up is done by the class HistogramDTOFactory.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form params
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data
        See Also:
        HistogramDTOFactory

      • getSinglePeriodGrossProduct

        StatisticalResultDTO getSinglePeriodGrossProduct(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the data value object for the gross product of a single period. A value for a period consists of the median amount, plus a number indication the 95%-confidence interval.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form parameters
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data

      • getThroughTheTimeGrossProduct

        StatisticalResultDTO getThroughTheTimeGrossProduct(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
        gets the data for the gross product per member, for all available years. A value for a year consists of the median amount, plus a number indication the 95%-confidence interval.
        Parameters:
        queryParameters - the form params
        Returns:
        a common result value object storing the data
